articles.author: Raf Casert, Danica Kirka
articles.title: 80 years ago World War II in Europe was over. Celebrating V-E Day is now tinged with some dread - AP News
articles.description: Europe is marking one of its most joyous days in history. The 80th anniversary of the end of World War II on the continent was on Thursday. Hitler’s Nazi Germany had finally surrendered on May 8, 1945, after a half-decade of invading other European powers and…
articles.content: LONDON (AP) Even if the end of World War II in Europe spawned one of the most joyous days the continent ever lived, Thursdays 80th anniversary of V-E Day is haunted as much by the specter of current-… [+5065 chars]
